content.label:
Rovio abandoned this game a year ago. There are no new updates. 
The matchmaking in ranked is broken. There has been no introduction of new material in the game. 
Rovio is a company that is only interested in new games, and has zero interest in upkeep Of the games they have made.

Don’t bother downloading or playing. Really one of the better games I’ve ever played on mobile but sadly dead. Last update was 8+ months ago. Impossible to find a ranked match. No updates, no support I’m surprised the servers are still on.

This game is really fun, but a while back the devs just gave up on it. This game had lots of potential and could have been an amazing game if the devs just made content updates  every once in a while.
The devolves have abandoned the game. There hasn’t been an update in over a year. It’s sad. Game used to be a lot of fun.
My only complaint is that there is a gift from dad and my dad passed away
A dead game, because many paid to improve their weapons.  Now nobody plays sadly dead ...
This game has to many hackers and I think Rovio team has a lot to do with it.

title.label: Would be great but... (I REALLY hope the game devs see this)

content.label: This game is fantastic... BUT the game is insanely broken for the mortars. There are jerks who place a mortar in EVERY slot and ruins the game for everyone. It’s no longer fun because you can’t do anything because some jerk(s) is shelling you constantly and you die. It is very upsetting when you get games where that happens back to back to back to back... and so on. What they CAN do to fix this is limit one mortar class weapon per boat. That will balance the game out SO much to where it is consistently enjoyable. This game for me so far is very fun (aside from the already mentioned). I really hope the devs see this and take it into consideration
It’s a good game!!!In my opinion it’s amazing there’s no mistake for me!!!!Its great
I’ve played this game before and with fortnite and mincraft boring me I figured I’d go back and get this game ima rating half cuz I don’t know what to expect
Average
Awesome game , needs a update

The game Battle Bay is a nice and great game, but it gets boring after a bit, I find myself repeatedly leaving the game behind and then coming back new things come, but in my opinion, there should be more new things, not new features, or game mechanics, I mean new weapons, ships, game modes. New stuff like that would keep the game new, but they always come slow, I think adding ONE new weapon a week should be easy, or per month, but nope, the last new thing added was the guardian, that has been in game for months now, the game needs new things, and fast, seriously, the game gets boring when everyone blasts you with rail guns and cannons. There is so much room left to improve, and that room gets filled with bug fixes, the game is getting old, there needs to be new things. That is all.
Nub tutorial

Super excited to play it. Everything was going well but I think it got a bug and it’s not letting me add a overboost that is requiring me to add and it’s not letting me add it because “there are not yellow empty spaces” 

It’s not letting me do anything else in the game just because of that
The game is awesome !!!!!🤩🤩🤩🤩🤩🤩 my username is lil’wrecker
Don’t waste your time or money on this trash game. The developers Rovio are a bunch of idiots.

The game was previously excellent, but currently very bad, there is no development for a long time, and currently it suffers more when you play, it is always idle and you cannot play. I am sorry for the money I spent on it to develop my level. The game was previously excellent, but currently very bad, there is no development for a long time, and currently it suffers more when you play, it...

When will you guys put an update? It’s been almost a year and the game hasn’t gotten an update, all it is, is bug fixes, and that has been today! So hopefully there will be an update. I still like the game though, but the aiming is a bit bad

title.label: Hackers, Authoritarian chat censors, pay to win

content.label:
The first thing will notice is how p2w the game is. Beyond this, the pricing scale is not even remotely reasonable. I dont mind dropping $5 on an app that i play hours and hours on, but we are talking $8 for a few weapons, $50 for a single premium boat that would otherwise take months. $50 for a single item in a single mobile game? lol.

Speed hacking in ranked battles is an issue. Chat censors are frustrating and block harmless messages

The chat censors in all global chat channels will prevent you from saying various things that they dont want people to see, such as “not many people in 5v5 right now” or “found another hacker in ranked”

title.label: Good game but also bad game

content.label: I love this game but it’s pay to win everyone I go against has high tier weapons and missile battery’s and I have cannons and mortars ranking should be based off of weapons not what game mode you are playing because making it so people can buy the best weapons in the game at the very first time they play doesn’t make the game fun and it doesn’t make other people want to buy stuff they just delete the game and leave a bad rating because this game could be so good but the developers want money not a good fun game that everyone can play.
Literally every game is just filled with bots with obvious bot names.  Not a multiplayer game
Love the game please take away casual. It’s rubbing the game

title.label: Best game ever! But has a few problems.

content.label: First off I want to say that this game is awesome and I will play it till the game is deleted off the App Store but I have to say it has a few problems. First is that sometimes in a ranked match there is a legendary league player in the match on your team and all they do is sail straight and doesn’t shoot anything and every time there is a legendary league player on my team I lose and soon I saw that it’s a bot. Second there were lots of updates then suddenly there is not one update to be seen in like a year, and if you do a report and a player for speed hacking or spamming the game doesn’t answer and does nothing to the player you sent it about. Before I started to play this game people were saying the game is dead and I’m like “how would it be dead?” and after I played a few matches I finally knew it was dead but I will never stop playing this game.
Support Xbox controller
stupid stupid stupid stupid Game

title.label: Cant play with your new friends.

content.label: They have infamy system which prevent you from team up with your friend who is 800 infamy lower than you.  Also for new comers, it will take them 20 min to wait for a ranking battle( lets not talk about the unfairness of system it self).  If only they limit the 800 infamy fleet rule on ranking but not “casual battle” , then new comers can enjoy playing with their friends .

title.label: This is the best game ever!!!!!!!!!!

content.label: It really good
I first downloaded this game it was like a dream this game is so good developer must be a really good person that’s all I have to say
Cannot reset account so mad fix this I’m on ios how to do it?
Interesting game !!!!
This is a fun game and all, BUT it’s so annoying when you get bombarded with mortars.... PLEASE NERF THE MORTARS. They are too over powered(500 damage with a common big berta)

The matchmaker is a joke, missiles, railguns, mortars, and carronades are overpowered.
Now keep in mind, I love rolling with the carro sleeper as my main. It actually involves skills and effort to use unlike spamming missiles and mortars. But... the carronade is kinda hopelessly OP when you are right up close and personal. (I want the slowness debuff to be removed or nerfed)

Also, something that I noticed people using is carronade guardians. But instead of skill. They spam shields and reverse at unnaturally fast speeds when you try to fight back. Also missiles need a significant nerf. (Imagine mortars but with more range and near-instant impact) also big torpedoes and explosive cannons need a nerf. Because the only thing that should do that stupid amount of damage are railguns and mines.

Also the matchmaking system is just pathetic. I’m level 21 and am sick getting stuck with people that insta kill me and all my teammates with legendary weapons
It’s a pretty good game but the boats are very difficult to move these controls should be fixed. Can matchmaking be balanced a little more? That is not as much of a problem as the controls though

This isn’t a review but I was in a game with daring manatee had the normal starter boat and had no spread power ups and was still zooming by me and I was a speed boat

P.S Add a report option

This game was great. But after I took a year break, infamy started 
lose it’s point. Games are rigged, you can’t match your infamy with others, leading to high level players playing with low levels, which is unfair

title.label: Good game just needs good internet

content.label: Amazing game recommended if you have a good internet upgrading finding weapons and ships very intertaining recommended for good gamers and relaxed people truly for everyone

Game is fun so I forgot why I stopped playing it. Tried to find a match and the “estimated wait” was 4 mins.. OH DO I REMEMBER NOW LMAOO!! Btw estimated is not an estimation. It’s a wild guess based on nothing. One time it estimated 1 min and I closed the app after waiting 3. Oh and btw the developers don’t care at all about the game. There hasn’t been a game update in ages. PLEASE don’t spend money on this!
I like it

This is a very good game, I highly recommend it. You can have a lot of fun on this game, but there are some really annoying players. The players the hang back and use the only motars, and spam every one playing it’s horrible. Also some people just target you when your at half heath, and you can’t do anything about it, know matter what there just going to destroy you! Another bad thing is that sometimes 3 or 4 people will all target you, and all you team mates don’t help you. Another thing is that the healer ships only heal them selves some times and that’s very annoying. Last, the shooter ship needs to go faster it’s way to slow compared to other ships.

title.label: I wish i could give this game no stars

content.label: Very unbalanced and this game pushes you to spend money. On top of that, the game clearly cheats. If you don’t spend real money, you get cheated on. Point blank shots miss, i wanna see Rovio explain that! Don’t waste your time with this one. No admin at all.

title.label: This game is great but this takes so long

content.label: Now I have played this game and it is so great. But one thing I am missing is that I wish we could fleet with more than one person. I wish ranked battles always never take so long. I wish ranked battle takes shorter. Just make the ranked battle take like 10 or seconds okay? Thank you very much for your support.

Good game but PLEASE make an in game personal  account system with a username and account code. That would be very helpful I created my account on android and I cannot access it on Apple no matter how much I try to log in with Facebook

I am on the cliff of quitting the game

This is one of the best games I’ve ever seen or played I love the challenge of getting parts to upgrade weapons and the joy of another captain level but it needs to balance match making a little more. I end up facing 400 infamy’s and I still have not reached 300 infamy just balance it out a little and it’s perfect. But the sniper cannon is also a little underrated there’s only a slight chance of critical damage more than a normal weapon it should do a little more damage

title.label: JUST SO EPIC I COULD NOT STOP PLAYING EVEN ON VACATION!

content.label: JUST SO GOOD COULD USE UPDATES THOUGH BUT JUST SO AMAZING! It is also kid friendly so good if your kids like to drive ships and fight on teams!

I’m tired of waiting for the game to assign me to a fleet.  Sometimes I get lucky and I am assigned in under a minute. But the majority of the time I wait and wait and wait.  Then I give up. I actually waited 7 minutes one day nothing.  Better things to do than wait.  F this game.

I have been playing this game since 2016 (I main speeder and fixer) and it was one of my favorite games in my opinion. But there are a few problems. Rovio hasn’t updated this game in a while, so It’s a little broken like the matchmaking, besides, there is an invisible glitch where you see an enemy, they disappear. It’s isn’t the one where an when you see an enemy that’s no longer in your field of vision, they disappear, but I had someone on the left disappear when my field of vision saw them!! Thats all I have to say, and while you can try and report people, they will still be playing, so don’t even try and think you can ban someone. I rate this a 4/5, I recommend this game to everyone, but rovio needs to come back and update this game, and a couple of bugs. Thanks and bye!

I was going through the tutorial of the game when it got to the part where you had to scrap items. I had accidentally closed the game right before this but when I opened up the game again I couldn’t tap on ANYTHING accept my shooter. I went to scrap the duct tape but I couldn’t even tap on the duct tape to scrap it. Since that’s all the tutorial wanted you to do I tried deleting and reinstalling the game and NOPE didn’t do anything at all. All I’m asking is if you could delete game data through the game by not having to go through the tutorial.
